What is your approximate home location?: What grade is your child in?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Nan ki klas pitit ou ye?

What is your approximate home location?: How does your child get TO school on most days?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Kijan pitit ou vini NAN lekòl la nan pifò jou yo?

What is your approximate home location?: Do you usually drop off your child on your way to work or another destination?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Si ou te chwazi “machin fanmi” oswa “ko-vwatiraj” pou vini nan lekòl la, èske chofè a kontinye travay oswa ale yon lòt kote anjeneral?

What is your approximate home location?: How does your child get home FROM school on most days?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Kijan pitit ou vini sòti NAN lekòl la pou ale lakay li nan pifò jou yo?

What is your approximate home location?: Do you usually pick up your child on your way from work or another origin?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Si ou te chwazi “machin fanmi” oswa “ko-vwatiraj” pou pitit ou sòti lekòl la pou ale lakay li, èske ou vin chèche pitit ou pandan ou sou wout apre travay ou oswa yon lòt kote?

What is your approximate home location?: How many vehicles do you have in your household?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Konbyen veyikil ou genyen lakay ou?

What is your approximate home location?: How many people in your household have a driver's license?
Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Konbyen moun lakay ou ki gen yon lisans chofè?

Apeprè ki kote lakay ou lokalize?: Machin fanmi (sèlman timoun ki nan fanmi ou)
